general.gui

Class RequestScopeMessaging

  • java.lang.Object
    • general.gui.RequestScopeMessaging

  • public class RequestScopeMessaging
extends java.lang.Object
    Passes on messages (info/warning/error/success) to the view. Uses RequestScope. JATOS has two similar messaging services, this and FlashScopeMessaging. Difference to FlashScopeMessaging: RequestScopeMessaging can have multiple messages for each kind (info/warning/error/success), but it does not survive a redirect (according to Play's documentation, flash scope isn't reliable).
